chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: A soft answer turneth away wrath: but grievous words stir up anger.
items.plainText: A soft answer turneth away wrath: but grievous words stir up anger.

items.text: The tongue of the wise useth knowledge aright: but the mouth of fools poureth out foolishness.
items.plainText: The tongue of the wise useth knowledge aright: but the mouth of fools poureth out foolishness.

items.text: The eyes of the LORD are in every place, beholding the evil and the good.
items.plainText: The eyes of the LORD are in every place, beholding the evil and the good.

items.text: A wholesome tongue is a tree of life: but perverseness therein is a breach in the spirit.
items.plainText: A wholesome tongue is a tree of life: but perverseness therein is a breach in the spirit.

items.text: A fool despiseth his father's instruction: but he that regardeth reproof is prudent.
items.plainText: A fool despiseth his father's instruction: but he that regardeth reproof is prudent.

items.text: In the house of the righteous is much treasure: but in the revenues of the wicked is trouble.
items.plainText: In the house of the righteous is much treasure: but in the revenues of the wicked is trouble.

items.text: The lips of the wise disperse knowledge: but the heart of the foolish doeth not so.
items.plainText: The lips of the wise disperse knowledge: but the heart of the foolish doeth not so.

items.text: The sacrifice of the wicked is an abomination to the LORD: but the prayer of the upright is his delight.
items.plainText: The sacrifice of the wicked is an abomination to the LORD: but the prayer of the upright is his delight.

items.text: The way of the wicked is an abomination unto the LORD: but he loveth him that followeth after righteousness.
items.plainText: The way of the wicked is an abomination unto the LORD: but he loveth him that followeth after righteousness.

items.text: Correction is grievous unto him that forsaketh the way: and he that hateth reproof shall die.
items.plainText: Correction is grievous unto him that forsaketh the way: and he that hateth reproof shall die.

items.text: Hell and destruction are before the LORD: how much more then the hearts of the children of men?
items.plainText: Hell and destruction are before the LORD: how much more then the hearts of the children of men?

items.text: A scorner loveth not one that reproveth him: neither will he go unto the wise.
items.plainText: A scorner loveth not one that reproveth him: neither will he go unto the wise.

items.text: A merry heart maketh a cheerful countenance: but by sorrow of the heart the spirit is broken.
items.plainText: A merry heart maketh a cheerful countenance: but by sorrow of the heart the spirit is broken.

items.text: The heart of him that hath understanding seeketh knowledge: but the mouth of fools feedeth on foolishness.
items.plainText: The heart of him that hath understanding seeketh knowledge: but the mouth of fools feedeth on foolishness.

items.text: All the days of the afflicted are evil: but he that is of a merry heart hath a continual feast.
items.plainText: All the days of the afflicted are evil: but he that is of a merry heart hath a continual feast.

items.text: Better is little with the fear of the LORD than great treasure and trouble therewith.
items.plainText: Better is little with the fear of the LORD than great treasure and trouble therewith.

items.text: Better is a dinner of herbs where love is, than a stalled ox and hatred therewith.
items.plainText: Better is a dinner of herbs where love is, than a stalled ox and hatred therewith.

items.text: A wrathful man stirreth up strife: but he that is slow to anger appeaseth strife.
items.plainText: A wrathful man stirreth up strife: but he that is slow to anger appeaseth strife.

items.text: The way of the slothful man is as an hedge of thorns: but the way of the righteous is made plain.
items.plainText: The way of the slothful man is as an hedge of thorns: but the way of the righteous is made plain.

items.text: A wise son maketh a glad father: but a foolish man despiseth his mother.
items.plainText: A wise son maketh a glad father: but a foolish man despiseth his mother.

items.text: Folly is joy to him that is destitute of wisdom: but a man of understanding walketh uprightly.
items.plainText: Folly is joy to him that is destitute of wisdom: but a man of understanding walketh uprightly.

items.text: Without counsel purposes are disappointed: but in the multitude of counsellors they are established.
items.plainText: Without counsel purposes are disappointed: but in the multitude of counsellors they are established.

items.text: A man hath joy by the answer of his mouth: and a word spoken in due season, how good is it!
items.plainText: A man hath joy by the answer of his mouth: and a word spoken in due season, how good is it!

items.text: The way of life is above to the wise, that he may depart from hell beneath.
items.plainText: The way of life is above to the wise, that he may depart from hell beneath.

items.text: The LORD will destroy the house of the proud: but he will establish the border of the widow.
items.plainText: The LORD will destroy the house of the proud: but he will establish the border of the widow.

items.text: The thoughts of the wicked are an abomination to the LORD: but the words of the pure are pleasant words.
items.plainText: The thoughts of the wicked are an abomination to the LORD: but the words of the pure are pleasant words.

items.text: He that is greedy of gain troubleth his own house; but he that hateth gifts shall live.
items.plainText: He that is greedy of gain troubleth his own house; but he that hateth gifts shall live.

items.text: The heart of the righteous studieth to answer: but the mouth of the wicked poureth out evil things.
items.plainText: The heart of the righteous studieth to answer: but the mouth of the wicked poureth out evil things.

items.text: The LORD is far from the wicked: but he heareth the prayer of the righteous.
items.plainText: The LORD is far from the wicked: but he heareth the prayer of the righteous.

items.text: The light of the eyes rejoiceth the heart: and a good report maketh the bones fat.
items.plainText: The light of the eyes rejoiceth the heart: and a good report maketh the bones fat.

items.text: The ear that heareth the reproof of life abideth among the wise.
items.plainText: The ear that heareth the reproof of life abideth among the wise.

items.text: He that refuseth instruction despiseth his own soul: but he that heareth reproof getteth understanding.
items.plainText: He that refuseth instruction despiseth his own soul: but he that heareth reproof getteth understanding.

items.text: The fear of the LORD is the instruction of wisdom; and before honour is humility.
items.plainText: The fear of the LORD is the instruction of wisdom; and before honour is humility.
